Authors:
Ting-Wen Chen, Philipp Sandmann, Ina Schaefer, Stefan
Scheu
Title:
Neutral lipid fatty acid composition as trait and constraint
in Collembola evolution
Keywords:
community phylogenetics; comparative method; functional
traits; phylogenetic signal; springtails; trophic niche
Abstract:
1. Functional traits determine the occurrence of species
along environmental gradients and the coexistence with other species.
Understanding how traits evolved among coexisting species helps to infer
community assembly processes.
